trends: There have been 59 other sightings in Tulsa
There was one other sighting in Tulsa on or around November 15th 2010
divs: sighting details1. where were you and what were you doing at the time? november 15, 2010 6:30 pm looking @ the moon. 2. what made you first notice the object? i glanced west, i saw out of the corner of my eye a object that was moving kinda jerky 3. what did you think the object was when you first noticed it? idk? 4. describe the object and its actions and motions. disc that had a red\orangish -dim white light-made no sound, moving above the trees, following this object was a [very bright white object with a redlight -made no sound.], useing the same jerks or moves to keep up with it. the red\orangish object stayed on a very slow nw path-- but then the very bright white object stopped and hovered above the treeline for a few minutes.-- then it went and followed the red\orangish object. 5. describe your feelings, reactions and actions, during and after sighting the object. but the "weird" thing was... 5 disc like objects with red\orangish lights followed behind them. 6. how did you lose sight of the object? i couldn't see them any more because they were flyin nw.
